text: Gleb Pavlovich Yakunin (; 4 March 1934 â€“ 25 December 2014) was a Russian priest and dissident. He fought for the freedom of conscience in the Soviet Union. He was member of Moscow Helsinki Group, and he was elected to Russian Parliaments from 1990 to 1999. Yakunin was born in Moscow, Soviet Union. He died at the age of 80 after a long illness on 25 December 2014 in Moscow, Russia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography and photo album of Gleb Yakunin * Interview with Portal-Credo.ru * Declaration on the church rights of Orthodox Communities and Eparchies Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Eastern Orthodox priests Category:Politicians from Moscow Category:Soviet dissidents
title: Gleb Yakunin
